title: Methodological proposal for the inclusion of citizen participation in the management and planning of urban public spaces
content:
Publication date: July 2024

Source: Cities, Volume 150

Author(s): Juan Jiménez-Caldera, Gren Y. Durango-Severiche, Raúl Pérez-Arévalo, José Luis Serrano-Montes, Jesús Rodrigo-Comino, Andrés Caballero-Calvo
